refnamediv.refpurpose: Interface for digital image capture elements

refentry.refsect1: Stability Level Unstable, unless otherwise indicated

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The interface allows access to some common digital image capture parameters.
refsect1.note: The GstPhotography interface is unstable API and may change in future. One can define GST_USE_UNSTABLE_API to acknowledge and avoid this warning.

refsect2.title: GstPhotographyCapturePrepared ()
refsect2.para: This callback will be called when the element has finished preparations and is ready for image capture. The next buffer that element produces will be of configured_caps format, so this callback allows the application to e.g. reconfigure capsfilters in pipeline if any.

entry.para: user data that has been given, when registering the callback
GstCaps defining the configured capture format. Ownership of these caps stays in the element.

refsect2.title: gst_photography_get_ev_compensation ()
refsect2.para: Get the ev compensation value for the GstElement

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if getting the value succeeded, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.title: gst_photography_get_iso_speed ()
refsect2.para: Get the ISO value (light sensivity) for the GstElement

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if getting the value succeeded, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.title: gst_photography_get_aperture ()

refsect3.para: TRUE if getting the value succeeded, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.para: Set the white balance mode for the GstElement

refsect3.title: Returns

refsect2.title: gst_photography_set_zoom ()
refsect2.para: Set the zoom value for the GstElement. E.g. 1.0 to get original image and 3.0 for 3x zoom and so on.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if setting the value succeeded, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.title: gst_photography_get_capabilities ()
refsect2.para: Get GstPhotographyCaps bitmask value that indicates what photography interface features the GstElement supports

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: GstPhotographyCaps value

refsect2.title: gst_photography_prepare_for_capture ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_photography_prepare_for_capture (GstPhotography *photo, GstPhotographyCapturePrepared func, GstCaps *capture_caps, gpointer user_data);
refsect2.para: Start preparations for capture. Preparations can take indeterminate amount of time and func callback is called after preparations are done. Image capture will begin after callback returns.

entry.para: callback that is called after capturing has been prepared
GstCaps defining the desired format of the captured image
user data that will be passed to the callback func

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if preparations were started (caps were OK), otherwise FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_photography_set_autofocus ()
refsect2.para: Start or stop autofocusing. GST_PHOTOGRAPHY_AUTOFOCUS_DONE message is posted to bus when autofocusing has finished.

entry.para: TRUE to start autofocusing, FALSE to stop autofocusing

refsect2.title: gst_photography_set_config ()
refsect2.para: Set all configuration settings at once.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if configuration was set successfully, otherwise FALSE.

refsect2.title: gst_photography_get_config ()
refsect2.para: Get all configuration settings at once.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if configuration was got successfully, otherwise FALSE.

refsect2.title: GstPhotography
refsect2.para: Opaque GstPhotography data structure.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyNoiseReduction
refsect2.para: Noise Reduction features of a photography capture or filter element.

entry.para: Adaptive noise reduction on Bayer format
reduces the noise on Y and 2-chroma images.
Multi-frame adaptive NR, provided for the video mode
Fixed Pattern Noise refers to noise that does not change between frames. The noise is removed from the sensor image, by subtracting a previously-captured black image in memory.
Extra Noise Reduction. In the case of high-ISO capturing, some noise remains after YCC NR. XNR reduces this remaining noise.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyWhiteBalanceMode
refsect2.para: Modes for white balance control.

entry.para: Disable automatic white balance adjustment and keep current values.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyColorToneMode
refsect2.para: Modes for special color effects.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographySceneMode
refsect2.para: Each mode contains preset GstPhotography options in order to produce good capturing result in certain scene.

entry.para: Mode for scene with fast motion
Take photos of fast moving objects (Since 1.2)
Avoid blurry pictures (for example, due to hand shake) (Since 1.2)
Capture the naturally warm color of scenes lit by candles (Since 1.2)
Applications are looking for a barcode (Since 1.2)

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyFlashMode
refsect2.para: Modes for flash control.

entry.para: Fire flash automatically according to lighting conditions.
Flash mode for reducing chance of capturing red eyes

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyFlickerReductionMode
refsect2.para: Reduce flicker in video caused by light source fluctuation.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyFocusMode
refsect2.para: Choose mode for focusing algorithm.

entry.para: Mode for focusing objects close to lens
Mode for landscapes and far away objects
Mode for maximum depth of field, keeping focus acceptable both in infinify and as close objects as possible
Disable automatic focusing and keep current value. “lens-focus” property can be used to change focus manually.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyFocusStatus
refsect2.para: Status of the focusing operation, used in GST_PHOTOGRAPHY_AUTOFOCUS_DONE message.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyCaps
refsect2.para: Bitmask that indicates which GstPhotography interface features an instance supports.

refsect2.title: enum GstPhotographyShakeRisk
refsect2.para: Risk level of captured image becoming "shaken" due to camera movement and too long exposure time. Used in GST_PHOTOGRAPHY_SHAKE_RISK GstMessage.

refsect2.title: GST_PHOTOGRAPHY_AUTOFOCUS_DONE
refsect2.para: Name of custom GstMessage that will be posted to GstBus when autofocusing is complete. This message contains following fields:

listitem.para: GstPhotographyFocusStatus "status": Tells if focusing succeeded or failed.
G_TYPE_INT "focus-window-rows": Tells number of focus matrix rows.
G_TYPE_INT "focus-window-columns": Tells number of focus matrix columns.

G_TYPE_INT "focus-window-mask": Bitmask containing rows x columns bits which mark the focus points in the focus matrix. Lowest bit (LSB) always represents the top-left corner of the focus matrix. This field is only valid when focusing status is SUCCESS.

refsect2.title: GST_PHOTOGRAPHY_SHAKE_RISK
refsect2.para: Name of custom GstMessage that is posted to GstBus during autofocusing process. It is posted if there is change in the risk of captured image becoming "shaken" due to camera movement and too long exposure time.
This message contains following fields:

listitem.para: GstPhotographyShakeRisk "status": Tells risk level of capturing shaken image.
